# Loops
---
Welcome to lecture 13! This class was taught by Daniel. Here is the link to the resource on **[Github](https://github.com/dannersy/lessons/tree/master/loops)**

#### AGENDA
---
- Warm-up
- Review warm-up
- What are loops and why do we need 'em?
- Iterate over "objects" using count controlled loop (`for`)
- Iterate using condition-controlled loops (`while`)
- One more.... (`forEach`)
- Problems
- Let's do some together
